content: create a fun scrappy-looking crochet hat to refresh your winter wardrobe working straight from the ball using red heart all in one granny square creates a lively effect in perfectly curated shades quick and easy to crochet the project is worked flat and in the round in single_crochet half-double_crochet working in back loops only and more this topper is a great way to add personality to your wardrobe red heart® all in one™ granny square™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m pink punch 2001 finished hat circumference small 18 45 58 cm medium 20 51 cm large 22 56 cm
